official_title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the month of May in each year as National Arthritis Month.

summary.text: Authorizes the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the month of May in each year as "National Arthritis Month."

titles.title: Joint resolution to authorize the President to issue annually a proclamation designating the month of May in each year as National Arthritis Month.
